articles.description: Senior Xavier Cooks poured in a career-high 36 points and added season highs of 16 rebounds and six blocked shots to power Winthrop to a 90-71 victory over Gardner-Webb on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Cooks' effort leads Winthrop past Gardner-Webb 90-71

articles.description: Jordon Varnado hit a jumper and Kevin Barker split a pair of free throws to complete a late Troy rally to slip past Coastal Carolina 66-65 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Troy rallies late to beat Coastal Carolina 66-65

articles.description: B.J. Stith poured in a career-high 36 points to go with 10 rebounds and Xavier Green added 17 points as Old Dominion blew out UTSA 100-62 on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Stith's big night leads Monarchs to rout of Roadrunners

articles.description: Fard Muhammad scored 22 points and grabbed eight rebounds to help Binghamton snap its seven-game losing streak by beating Stony Brook 69-57 in an America East battle Thursday night.
articles.headline: Muhammad helps Binghamton halt skid, tops Stony Brook 69-57

articles.description: Keenan Simmons scored 25 points on 12-of-12 shooting, Jalen Henry added 12 points, including the winning free throw with 16 seconds left, and SIU-Edwardsville beat Tennessee-Martin 70-69 on Thursday night to end a five-game skid in the series against...
articles.headline: Henry's free throw lifts SIU-Edwardsville over Tenn-Martin

articles.description: Tony Carr scored 30 points and Penn State routed No. 8 Ohio State 79-56 on Thursday night to sweep the Buckeyes.
articles.headline: Carr, Watkins lead Penn State over No. 8 Ohio State

images.caption: With 2.9 seconds on the clock Josh Reaves delivers a baseball pass to Tony Carr who finishes a tough layup and draws the foul.
images.name: Carr puts exclamation point on first half with and-1 bucket
